review: I was very excited to get my Amazon Fire TV Stick; unfortunately, after 3 hours of trying to get it to work, including 45 minutes on the phone with Amazon, nobody could figure out why it would lose connection from the internet every 30 seconds. When I ran a test on the device, it said it was connected with good strength. I unplugged and restarted the Fire TV stick multiple times. I restarted my internet multiple times. Both my cell phone and laptop were connecting to the internet alright. At the end of the night I made the decision to just return the product altogether. It's an awesome concept, but unfortunately I think that I just received one that was bad.
